name: Gun Fight (Jared Springer)
description:
This is a game of Gun Fight. The objective of this game is to shoot the other player and get as many points as you can. Player 1 is the outlaw and Player 2 is the sheriff. I also put in the shotgun as a power-up. The player who gets it can use it as an extra tool to help defeat the other player.

Player 1 controls: W, A, S, D to move; space arrow to shoot, Q and E to angle the weapon up or down

Player 2 controls: Numpad 8, 4, 5, and 6 to move; down arrow to shoot; numpad 1 and 3 to angle the weapon up or down

NOTE: You can also use the gamepad for this game.
